active.name: Electric Trip Wire
active.description: Routes a high-voltage current line. Enemies passing through will take damage and movement speed will decrease.

passive.name: Territorial Effect
passive.description: Increases team backup ammo and Sniper/LMG damage by 25%.

active.name: Medical Station
active.description: Instantly rescue all downed teammates and continuously heal allies in proximity.

passive.name: Medic
passive.description: Increases team HP and Shotgun/SMG damage by 25%.

active.name: Active Camo
active.description: Become invisibile and increase movement speed.

passive.name: Voidwalker
passive.description: Increases team movement speed while also raising Shotgun damage by 25% and doubling Pistol damage.

active.name: Sentry Gun
active.description: Place a Sentry Gun that automatically attacks enemies within range

passive.name: Firepower
passive.description: Increases team fire rate and Sniper/Assault damage by 25%.

active.name: Ravager Launcher
active.description: Deploy a Ravager Launcher that automatically locks onto enemy soldiers and vehicles within range.

passive.name: Demo Expert
passive.description: Increases the damage of explosives by 100%.
